Docs.param: An instance.
Options for the .
The ILogger implementation this adapter should use.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using configuration settings.
Docs.remarks: The configuration keys are: TwilioNumber: The phone number associated with the Twilio account. TwilioAccountSid: The string identifier of the account. See https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-is-a-sid TwilioAuthToken: The authentication token for the account. TwilioValidationUrl: The validation URL for incoming requests.

Docs.param: A reference to the conversation to continue.
The method to call for the resulting bot turn.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Docs.summary: Sends a proactive message to a conversation.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
Docs.remarks: Call this method to proactively send a message to a conversation. Most channels require a user to initiate a conversation with a bot before the bot can send activities to the user.

Docs.param: A for the conversation.
A reference to the conversation to continue.
The method to call for the resulting bot turn.
Cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Sends a proactive message from the bot to a conversation.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
Docs.remarks:
Call this method to proactively send a message to a conversation. Most _channels require a user to initialize a conversation with a bot before the bot can send activities to the user.
This method registers the following services for the turn.
(key = "BotIdentity"), a claims claimsIdentity for the bot.
